cards.title: View Cards
cards.p1: Both current decks have six suits and there are also two Joker cards. Each suit contains 13 cards      (Ace, 2-10, Jack, Queen and King). This page contains the card browser where you can browse through each of the     cards in the OWASP Cornucopia decks.
cards.p2: For the previously called Ecommerce Website Edition. Instead of EoP’s STRIDE suits, the suits were selected based on the structure of the OWASP Secure Coding Practices - Quick Reference Guide (SCP). The content was mainly drawn from the SCP but with additional consideration of sections in the OWASP Application Security Verification Standard, the OWASP Web Security Testing Guide and David Rook's Principles of Secure Development. These provided five suits, and a sixth called “Cornucopia” was created for everything else:
cards.p3: The second Cornucopia deck, the “Mobile App Edition”, follows the same principles and game rules as the original OWASP Cornucopia, but has different suits based on the MASVS categories, in addition to the Cornucopia suit that contains threats related to mobile malware and privacy issues:
